snippet.title: Game of Thrones New Trailer (PS3 / Xbox 360)
snippet.description:
Game of Thrones New Trailer (PS3 / Xbox 360). The RiverSpring Trailer unveils one of the many town featured in the video game. "A vacant lordship and civil unrest greet Alester Sarwyck, as he returns home after a 15 year self-imposed exile. He arrives as the town mourns the passing of his father, the elder Lord Sarwyck, forcing Alester to consider reclaiming rule of Riverspring and restoring order to his lordship"
Game of Thrones New Trailer. Release Date for PS3 & Xbox 360 : Early 2012. Suscribe now to get more gameplay trailer !
